cars.name: Hatchback
cars.description: A hatchback is a car with a hatch-type rear door that opens upwards and often a shared volume for the passenger and cargo areas. The first production hatchback was released by Citroen in 1938. The Citroën 11CV Commerciale.

cars.name: Sedan
cars.description: A sedan, or saloon, is a passenger car in a three-box configuration with separate compartments for engine, passenger, and cargo.
